stepper.pcontent: Click here for the project particulars.
stepper.loccontent: Click here for the proper procedures of each task.
stepper.tcontent: Great job! We appreciate your every contribution towards our project.

register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: please provide the following personal information
register.name: Your name

msg.invalid: Please make sure you have issued every form fields properly!

task.design_notification: The design was motivated by Google Translate Community!
task.tr_desc:
Allocate mongolian words corresponding to
a given concept in multilingual forms
task.md_desc: Correct mistakes found in given mongolian words of a concept
task.vd_desc: Validate list of mongolian words that define its concept
task.gtr_desc: Contribute a translation of the gloss of a given concept
task.gmd_desc: Pick up out of the given translations of a concept and modify its quality
task.gvd_desc: Sort modified glosses with respect to their translation qualities
task.loc_desc: Click here to look over the guidelines of localizing ontology

domain.headline: Please localize concept sets in multilingual terms into Mongolian!

translation.psubtitle: Wait a sec, let me recall my precedents.
translation.title: Allocate
translation.subtitle: Define mongolian words that indicate the following concepts

modification.title: Rearrange
modification.subtitle: Correct the words representing a given concept or remove ones that you find inappropriate
modification.clear: This word is unfit for this concept

validation.title: Validate
validation.subtitle: Label given words of a concept accordingly

gtranslation.title: Translate
gtranslation.subtitle: Translate the following gloss sentence of a concept to Mongolian
gtranslation.label: Gloss translation field
gtranslation.hint: you don't need to translate none other than the gloss

gmodification.title: Modify
gmodification.subtitle: Modify syntactic structure of a sentence out of the given translations of the gloss
gmodification.label: Gloss modification field
gmodification.placeholder: Put your edited translation here, please...
gmodification.hint: you don't need to translate none other than the gloss
gmodification.ref_desc: Click here to see the previous translations, as a reference
gmodification.prev: a translation from a previous stage

gvalidation.title: Sort
gvalidation.subtitle: Rearrange the following gloss translations according to your own priorities of translation quality

tr_alerts.no_data: There is no data to send!
tr_alerts.save_err: There was an error while saving your translation, try again!
tr_alerts.no_prev: There is no previous record in this domain.
tr_alerts.no_next: There is no next record in this domain.
tr_alerts.no_gapreason: You need to provide gap reason prior to send!

md_alerts.invalid: Your modifications are invalid. Please look over each word!
md_alerts.save_err: There was an error while saving your modification, try again!
md_alerts.last: You cannot remove the last remnant!

vd_alerts.invalid: Your validations are invalid. Please look over each word!
vd_alerts.save_err: There was an error while saving your validation, try again!

auth.change_uname: Username has already been taken. Please choose another one!

task.unavail: There is no task left for this domain, please choose another.

trans.saved: Translation saved successfully, thank you for your contributions!
trans.err: Translation not saved properly, try again!

mod.saved: Modification saved successfully, thank you for your contributions!
mod.err: Modification not saved properly, try again!

valid.saved: Validation saved successfully, thank you for your contributions!
valid.err: Validation not saved properly, try again!

gap: Please provide concrete evidence about why you find this word a gap
